title: The Last of UsPart II
description: Worked on a UI team of two, composed of a UI artist and myself, to design, implement, and iterate on the UI, using both the in-house scripting language and C++. Trained a third team-member (UI scripter) towards the end of the project. Was also responsible for tool improvements, Photoshop / Illustrator scripting to improve the artist's workflow, and keyframe animating the majority of the UI.

quotes.quote:
It floored me on just about every level.
The most intense combat I've ever had in a videogame.
quotes.title: Greg Miller | Gamespot

quotes.quote: Beyond the hype and expectation placed around so much of The Last of Us Part II, there's a sturdy little video game, that's had some thoughtful tweaks.
quotes.title: Zoe Delahunty-Light | Eurogamer
